title: Chao Bian Wu Shou
synopsis: A full year after defeating the Fire Giant, Tago, Zhuo Feng, Fei Ni, and Todi received acceptance letters from the God of War. After entering the War God Academy, they witnessed the extraordinary energy of the super-change God of War. Through the training of the college, their personal strength and teamwork have been continuously strengthened. Under the leadership of the cursed evil god, the dragon army hidden in the dark world is delusional to occupy the entire world. The super-changeable heroes led by Tago have gained friendship and hope in the battle with the dragon army, large and small, and gradually grown into the super-changeable god of war, and have a closer and tacit understanding with the martial beasts. But peace is short-lived. The extremely powerful dragon generals went to the War Seminary to launch attacks. Under unexpected attacks, the principal and the teacher fell one after another. Misfortune did not come singly, and the cursed evil god awakened from the seal also approached the college. In order to protect peace and justice, the super-changeable gods and the cursed evil god launched a final battle of life and death. Can the super-change gods guard the peace of the world?(translated from douban)
